MCDAQ¶

class daq.MCDAQ(params, function='input', arange='BIP20VOLTS')¶

Bases: mcdaq.mcdaq.MCDAQ

__init__(params, function='input', arange='BIP20VOLTS')¶
__module__ = 'daq'¶
out(channel, value)¶
read(channel)¶
daq.TTL(params)¶

Waits until a positive TTL signal appears on the given channel, then return

daq.connect(adc)¶

A wrapper function which initializes an ADC of the desired type with the arguments contained in the params dict

daq.measure(params=None, logic='mean')¶

Args: params: dict containing three fields

ADC: a member of some ADC class with a .read() method gate_time: averaging time in ms channel: the proper channel for the ADC
